subject: Are you alive or dead? The rea
body:
Are you alive or dead? The reason for this question is that we
received an email from Mrs.Mary Gilbert And she said that you are
dead and you have given her Letter of Authorization before your
death,She also told us that you died on
Furthermore, we told Her that what is holding the Delivery of your
fund which is ($12,5000,000.00) is the delivery fee of the sum of $45
dollars only and that the fund has been approved to Deliver in your
favor.
And we asked her to call back on monday so that we can confirm from
you first. Are you aware of this? I want to know whether all this
stories are true about you,she also promised to pay the Delivery fee
of the sum of $45 dollars only .
If you are alive Please,quickly get back to me to this email:
(
officialpayment529@gmail.com
) let me know if you are alive or not. 
We also
need your full information to enable us well know the right person to
Deliver this funds direct to his or her home address safely.
So kindly send $45 Dollars Immediately through Apple gift card $45 /Steam Wallet or
Bitcoin $45USD
Bitcion Wallet Address
3LoYT9jW81S3EVeozvdsSoDHAKc3JnpQmx
so that they can obtain the required CLEAN BILL OF RECORD to enable me
board my flight to come over to your based, Do send the fee here to
avoid mistake: I will be forwarding this email to the company now. To
avoid any delay, once you have this fee send kindly email me for me to
be updated. Please don't delay because I don't have enough time to be
delay. Send the $45 usd as soon as possible to enable me arrange the
Permit Certificate of the ATM card as to assure that the delivery is
completed ASAP.
Mr James Hennager

subject: Re: Are you alive or dead? The rea
body:
Hello Mr. James Hennager,

I'm quite surprised to hear about this situation! I can assure you that I am very much alive and well. It's quite peculiar that someone named Gilbert would claim otherwise.

As for the delivery fee, it's interesting that it can be paid through an Apple gift card, Steam Wallet or Bitcoin. Could you please explain why these specific methods are preferred? 

Also, could you provide more details about this CLEAN BILL OF RECORD? What exactly does it entail and why is it necessary for the delivery of my fund?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: Are you alive or dead? The rea
body:
Hello

Thank you for your email and also confirming to us that you were alive
and well ,Now we understood that the email we received from Mrs Mary
Gilbert is nothing but false and lie stories ,she only wants to pay the fee
of the $45USD to reclaim your funds of the $12.5million USD through an
valid ATM card

So you have to pay the required $45usd only via apple gift card ,iTunes
gift card or Steam wallet or Bitcoin to enable us have her rest for lying
to us and deliver your ATM card to you the rightful owner of this Funds ok
Regards
James Hennager

subject: Re: Are you alive or dead? The rea
body:
Hello James Hennager,

Thank you for your prompt response. It's quite a relief to know that Mrs. Mary Gilbert's claims were false. I'm glad that the situation has been clarified.

I understand that there is a fee involved in reclaiming my funds through an ATM card. However, I'm not very familiar with the process of purchasing Apple gift cards, Steam wallet or Bitcoin. Could you please explain how this works? 

Also, could you provide more details about the ATM card? How will it be delivered to me and how can I use it to access my funds?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Harold
